input.status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Prof. Miracle Abshire (2):rejected by Prof. Miracle Abshire (3):offer submitted by Prof. Miracle Abshire

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: It is the manufacturers recommendation that the East Powerhouse ACB's are maintained as they are 5 years old
scope_of_work.scope:
Attend CBRE office for induction and sign relevant paperwork
All switching to be completed by CBRE
Handover ACB to contractor to carry out maintenace as follows
Air Circuit Breakers
- Full 20 Point mechanical service.
- All Coils / Accessories functionality and impedance checked – where possible.
- Moving / Arcing contacts cleaned / inspected. Contact wear and arcing contact gaps measured
and recorded.
- Protection Release injected at multiple thresholds. All trip times verified against manufacturer’s
tripping curves.
- 30 Mechanical service operations carried out.
- Fixed Portion cleaned and subject to 10 Point inspection.
- Mechanical interlock visually inspected for set up and functionality.
- ACB low Ohm continuity (10A) and insulation resistance (500v) tested.
- Successful re-instatement.
Restore ACB to normal service
Sign off relevant paperwork
scope_of_work.justification: It is the manufacturers recommendation that the East Powerhouse ACB's are maintained as they are 5 years old. Maintenance can reduce the risk of failure of parts resulting in possible outage on the UPS system which will in turn affect the IT load
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Maintenance can reduce the risk of failure of parts resulting in possible outage on the UPS system which will in turn affect the IT load

2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value

The problem statement indicates: It is the manufacturers recommendation that the East Powerhouse ACB's are maintained as they are 5 years old. The defined scope of work includes: Attend CBRE office for induction and sign relevant paperwork
All switching to be completed by CBRE
Handover ACB to contractor to carry out maintenace as follows
Air Circuit Breakers
- Full 20 Point mechanical service.
- All Coils / Accessories functionality and impedance checked – where possible.
- Moving / Arcing contacts cleaned / inspected. Contact wear and arcing contact gaps measured
and recorded.
- Protection Release injected at multiple thresholds. All trip times verified against manufacturer’s
tripping curves.
- 30 Mechanical service operations carried out.
- Fixed Portion cleaned and subject to 10 Point inspection.
- Mechanical interlock visually inspected for set up and functionality.
- ACB low Ohm continuity (10A) and insulation resistance (500v) tested.
- Successful re-instatement.
Restore ACB to normal service
Sign off relevant paperwork. The justification provided is: It is the manufacturers recommendation that the East Powerhouse ACB's are maintained as they are 5 years old. Maintenance can reduce the risk of failure of parts resulting in possible outage on the UPS system which will in turn affect the IT load. If not approved, the effect would be: Maintenance can reduce the risk of failure of parts resulting in possible outage on the UPS system which will in turn affect the IT load.

input.status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Prof. Miracle Abshire (2):rejected by Prof. Miracle Abshire (3):offer submitted by Prof. Miracle Abshire (4):work in progress by Prof. Miracle Abshire

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: Following recent maintenance it was found that the isolator and flow switch are faulty and need replacing
scope_of_work.scope:
Isolate system (LOTOTO)
Remove old faulty isolator
Fit new isolator (Complete modifications as necessary)
Stop both water pumps and isolate water valves
Release pressure from system
Remove faulty flow switch
Fit new flow switch
Open water valves and vent air.
Turn on pumps
Remove isolations
Run and test
Tidy site and complete paperwork
scope_of_work.justification: The York chiller provides cooling for the Air Handling Units serving the Data Centre and recovery suites
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: There will be no cooling for the Air Handling Units serving the Data Centre and recovery suites

input.project_name: UPM-HW4 DX3 Unit 2 Compressor and Display Screen Replacement
input.status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):work in progress by Flo Hodkiewicz

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem:
Further to our Specialist contractors engineers recent site visit, their engineer has identified that the compressor in HW4 DX3 system No.2 has failed and requires replacing. 
The engineer also noted an issue with the 
display with missing lines, which interferes with the operation of the unit and also requires replacing.
scope_of_work.scope:
1. LOTO unit
2. Recover the refrigerant charge (record volume)
3. Disconnect and remove the compressor (hot works)
4. Install a new compressor (hot work)
5. Pressure test the unit with OFN
6. Evacuate to 4mbar
7. Remove and install new compressor contactor
8. Remove and install a new display
9. Re-establish the power supply
10. Recharge the unit T
11.Test run the unit 
12. Check the display operation
scope_of_work.justification: The Current Unit DX 3 in HW4, Has 2 compressors. currently Unit 2 compressor has mechanically failed, resulting in the unit not being able operate to it's  potential, to be resilient within the suite. Whilst the failure was being investigated the engineer found the display screen where you enter passwords to find the set menus to identify the operation and faults on the unit was starting to fail. without this unit operating as it should we could loose resilience within the HW4 suite which could result in hardware failing.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: The Current Unit DX 3 in HW4, Has 2 compressors. currently Unit 2 compressor has mechanically failed, resulting in the unit not being able operate to it's  potential, to be resilient within the suite. Whilst the failure was being investigated the engineer found the display screen where you enter passwords to find the set menus to identify the operation and faults on the unit was starting to fail. without this unit operating as it should we could loose resilience within the HW4 suite which could result in hardware failing.
